column4: How do I enable Windows to download the correct printer driver from my Linux server?
I don't know the exact process, but you can just order a free CD from ubuntu.com
How do I enable Windows to download the correct printer driver from my Linux server?
is there some install procedure within windows to add a network printer ?
it doesn't ask for your printers cd disk ?
yeah but windows needs to load the driver to format the data for your model of printer
can you add it manually and set it as a netowrk printer (I haven't run windows in like 5 years, going from memory :D)
so you can't add a network printer somewhere in the control panel ?
this might help if your using cups >> http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/NetworkPrintingFromWin2000
have you looked at >> www.ubuntuguide.org there is a whole section on getting Samba up and running and there are resources on the wiki
why not just use python it's 10 times easier to learn :)
there are not any high quality ones as of yet
